title: Pre paid Cards for Riot Points being successful but not getting added on.
body: _**Has anyone recently has problems with prepaid cards for RP I spent $20 and it has said it was successful but has not put the RP to my account yet...... How can I fix this so I get the RP I brought. It was 2 $10 Cards so I Should have 2200 RP on my account. ******_

replies.body:
Dear Players

I have also had the problem and as everyone else on this server who is actually having problems with the RP system, You will need to wait patiently. RP system is a very dangerous and risky codings as they need to get every code correct. By calling them ''useless'' just makes it very hard for them to actually complete them. So please wait patiently and as always, send a ticket to riot

NOTE: This may take at least 48 hours for them to reply as they are backed up with other request from other players. Please wait patiently!

I agree with **KaSing**, Just give it time and surely they will fix the problem. Just send a ticket and wait for a reply. Don't become a total brat and go spamming around other posts about how crappy Riot is atm **@DeathSoulja**. Yes mate im talking specifically on you because every post I click on (relating to the RP issue) I see your name with either a rude comment to riot or simply complaining non-stop about your RP not going to your account. Please, have the decency to wait patiently and let the professional team work on the issue. Clearly if more posts are popping about this issue, it will pop onto riots ''concern'' list and they will try their best to fix it. As for now just sit and wait patiently just like the rest of us.

Yours sincerely
-Diamond IV

It should be on the "concern" list regardless, its people's money. I agree we should be patient but its hard when the ticket i sent didn't even get read they just saw the Subject line and assumed it was the generic problem they have a general fix for. no one has given any reason as to why the System isn't working, which is why people are getting annoyed.

Well I sent mine yesterday and got a reply today. I was pretty much the first person to send a ticket about this problem and so now more people are sending tickets to riot. Dont forget they have to also read other peoples tickets like banned accounts, computer issues, client issues etc. Im pretty sure they are trying to get to your request. Make sure to ready your #number on your request as it tells you how many people have requested something. Im pretty sure that if you were in their shoes, it would be difficult to go to everyone. Some issues are bigger than just this RP system. Thats why SephirothSG is going to everyones forum, concerning with the RP issue to send a ticket. If you go to my forum post and my ticket, they replied saying that they will refer me to someone in the ''billing'' industry. I too am waiting for them to reply. 

As what KaSing said, they will take atleast 2 days to get to your request. Also im sure the team is working on fixing it which is shown on the yellow icon next to your name on the top right corner. Keep waiting patiently and you will get your RP.
